name: Sword Cat
description:
--Still being updated--

Currently Character Interaction doesn't work.

Sword Cat is a 3D Collection Action Game.  You play as a small cat with sword wings chase after and deliver tumble yarn, a valuable resource in the desert oasis town.

Controls

Mouse and KeyboardControllerMovementWASD + Mouse (Camera)Left and Right SticksInteractionSpace BarAShoot Left Sword (+ Teleport to Left Sword if Attached to Object)Left Mouse ClickLeft TriggerRecall Left SwordLeft BumperShoot Right Sword (+ Teleport to Right Sword if Attached to Object)Right Mouse ClickRight TriggerRecall Right SwordRight Bumper
